string-array.name: expectations
string-array.item: We expect to gain more knowledge and understanding that I can apply in both academic and real life.
We expect to have fun and understand the lessons that will be taught.
We expect this course to be challenging but also rewarding.
We also expect to improve our skills and become more confident in applying what we learn.
We expect to receive constructive feedback that will help us grow and improve.

string-array.name: contributions
string-array.item: We will give our utmost effort in completing assignments and projects on time.
We will always listen, attend classes, and pass the requirements.
We will participate and contribute to group activities, and communicate properly.
We will help organize group work and ensure everyone participates.
We will maintain a positive attitude and be respectful to our peers and instructor.

string-array.name: motivations
string-array.item: We are motivated by our goal to succeed academically and personally.
We are motivated because of our family\'s financial status
We are motivated to pass this course with a satisfactory grade so we can graduate on time.
We are motivated by our dream to have a stable and fulfilling career in the future.
We are driven by a genuine interest in the subject and a desire to master new skills.

string-array.name: hindrances
string-array.item: We sometimes struggle with time management because of different responsibilities.
We love sleeping.
We also acknowledge that we have many hobbies that may distract us from being productive.
Sometimes unexpected events or personal problems may also affect our focus and performance.
We sometimes tend to procrastinate on tasks that we find difficult or overwhelming.

string-array.name: members
string-array.item: Carino, Ian Kyril
Gaddi, Noel
